price: 85.Waxaa ku dhicina Qowlkii (Cadaabka) 24, dulmigoodii darti, marka ma hadlayaan.
arabic: وَوَقَعَ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ عَلَيۡهِم بِمَا ظَلَمُواْ فَهُمۡ لَا يَنطِقُونَ
footnotes: 24. Qaddarka Alle baa ku dhaboobi korkooda, oo yaboohiisa waa fuli.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wawaqaʿa al-qawlu ʿalayhim bimā ẓalamū fahum lā yanṭiqūna
